set_value.name: $DynamicWarEventFactionTwo
set_value.exact: if ($ClaimspaceList.{1}? and $ClaimspaceList.{1} != null) then $ClaimspaceList.{1} else null
set_value.weight: if ($ClaimspaceList.{1}? and $PossibleFactionMilStrengthList.{1}? and $PossibleFactionMiscModifierList.{1}? and $FactionTable.{$ClaimspaceList.{1}}?) then (1 + ($FactionTable.{$ClaimspaceList.{1}} * $PossibleFactionMilStrengthList.{1} * $PossibleFactionMiscModifierList.{1})) else 0

set_value.name: $DynamicWarEventFactionTwo
set_value.exact: if ($ClaimspaceList.{2}? and $ClaimspaceList.{2} != null) then $ClaimspaceList.{2} else null
set_value.weight: if ($ClaimspaceList.{2}? and $PossibleFactionMilStrengthList.{2}? and $PossibleFactionMiscModifierList.{2}? and $FactionTable.{$ClaimspaceList.{2}}?) then (1 + ($FactionTable.{$ClaimspaceList.{2}} * $PossibleFactionMilStrengthList.{2} * $PossibleFactionMiscModifierList.{2})) else 0

set_value.name: $DynamicWarEventFactionTwo
set_value.exact: if ($ClaimspaceList.{3}? and $ClaimspaceList.{3} != null) then $ClaimspaceList.{3} else null
set_value.weight: if ($ClaimspaceList.{3}? and $PossibleFactionMilStrengthList.{3}? and $PossibleFactionMiscModifierList.{3}? and $FactionTable.{$ClaimspaceList.{3}}?) then (1 + ($FactionTable.{$ClaimspaceList.{3}} * $PossibleFactionMilStrengthList.{3} * $PossibleFactionMiscModifierList.{3})) else 0

set_value.name: $DynamicWarEventFactionTwo
set_value.exact: if ($ClaimspaceList.{4}? and $ClaimspaceList.{4} != null) then $ClaimspaceList.{4} else null
set_value.weight: if ($ClaimspaceList.{4}? and $PossibleFactionMilStrengthList.{4}? and $PossibleFactionMiscModifierList.{4}? and $FactionTable.{$ClaimspaceList.{4}}?) then (1 + ($FactionTable.{$ClaimspaceList.{4}} * $PossibleFactionMilStrengthList.{4} * $PossibleFactionMiscModifierList.{4})) else 0

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DeadAirDynamicWar -- %1 -- Factiontwo possibilities: %2 -- Chance: %3 -- MilStrengthFactor: %4 -- MiscFactor: %5 -- Final weight: %6'.[player.age,$ClaimspaceList.{$W}, $FactionTable.{$ClaimspaceList.{$W}},$PossibleFactionMilStrengthList.{$W},$PossibleFactionMiscModifierList.{$W},(1 + ($FactionTable.{$ClaimspaceList.{$W}} * $PossibleFactionMilStrengthList.{$W} + $PossibleFactionMiscModifierList.{$W}))]

set_value.name: $ExcludedFactions
set_value.exact: [faction.civilian, faction.criminal, faction.khaak, faction.player, faction.smuggler, faction.visitor, faction.xenon]

set_value.name: $MiscDebug
set_value.exact: player.age + ' - ' + $ClaimspaceList.{$G}.name + ' - Primary Race Comparison Factor: ' + (if $DynamicWarEventFaction.primaryrace == $ClaimspaceList.{$G}.primaryrace then ($PrimaryRaceModifier + 1) else (1 - $PrimaryRaceModifier))

set_value.name: $MiscDebug
set_value.exact: player.age + ' - ' + $ClaimspaceList.{$H}.name + ' - Primary Race Comparison Factor: ' + (if $DynamicWarEventFaction.primaryrace != $ClaimspaceList.{$H}.primaryrace then ($PrimaryRaceModifier + 1) else (1 - $PrimaryRaceModifier))
